alert.note: Alert for Northern Centre; Northern Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 1:17PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL CENTRE AND WEST CENTRAL CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM EDT... At 117 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Bellefonte, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Centre and west central Clinton Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and north central Pennsylvania.
